knimeNode.name: Database Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Establishes and opens a database access connection from which to read data.

fullDescription.intro: Establishes and opens a database access connection from which to read data. Make sure you have your personal database driver registered. The sun.jdbc.odbc.JdbcOdbcDriver is available by default only but you can use the load button to register additional drivers from Zip or Jar.
fullDescription.option: Enter the database driver here; it is a Java class (including the package path), for example: sun.jdbc.odbc.JdbcOdbcDriver
Register additional driver from Zip or Jar files.
Enter the database name here, for example jdbc:odbc:database_name or jdbc:mysql://host:port/database_name
Your log-in user name for the database.
Your log-in password for the database. Note, the password is de- and encryted everytime before handling it internally and is not stored inside the settings.
Enter the SQL-like query here, for example SELECT * FROM table

ports.dataOut: Table with data read from the database
